mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, email, password, phone, privilege, name, region, datetime, point) VALUES (seq_member.nextval,#{email},#{password},#{phone},3,#{name},#{region},sysdate,50)

INSERT INTO member (id, email, password, phone, privilege, name, zipcode, address1, address2, address3, job, introduction, datetime, point) VALUES (seq_member.nextval,#{email},#{password},#{phone},2,#{name},#{zipcode},#{address1},#{address2},#{address3},#{job},#{introduction},sysdate,50)
